docs.text: tzutrader An experiment on building a composable C++ trading backtesting library. At this moment, the implementation covers only very basic features, in order to explore and validate design and architecture choices. Criticism is very welcome! Source code: https://codeberg.org/jailop/tzutrader API documentation: https://jailop.codeberg.page/tzutrader/docs/html
docs.title: Home
